issue.title: [CI][GLib] Failed to load glib2.so on Windows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15334](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15334). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```

<internal:C:/hostedtoolcache/windows/Ruby/3.0.3/x64/lib/ruby/3.0.0/rubygems/core_ext/kernel_require.rb>:96:in `require': 127: The specified procedure could not be found.   - C:/hostedtoolcache/windows/Ruby/3.0.3/x64/lib/ruby/gems/3.0.0/gems/glib2-3.5.0/lib/glib2.so (LoadError)
```

It will be related to change something on GitHub Actions between 2021-01-13 and 2021-01-14.
